CustomField.description: External ID and unique identifier for the base product line. The base product is generally the tier or core product the customer has purchased. Base record is processed by integration after the related add on products so the full product information can be processed. Add on products will have the Parent ID be equal to the Base ID to associate the add ons to the right base product.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: External ID and unique identifier for the base product line. The base product is generally the tier or core product the customer has purchased. Base record is processed by integration after the related add on products so the full product information can be processed. Add on products will have the Parent ID be equal to the Base ID to associate the add ons to the right base product.
CustomField.label: Company Base ID
